alert.note: Alert for Brunswick; Mecklenburg (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 11 at 12:33PM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Mecklenburg and southwestern Brunswick Counties through 100 PM EST... At 1232 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ebony, or near Brodnax, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lawrenceville, Brodnax, Brunswick, Gasburg, Ebony, Bowens Corner, White Plains, Meredithville and Lake Gaston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 PM EST for south central Virginia.
